identity.name: Kulikari
identity.design_philosophy: Digital Scrapbook meets Modern Chat. Tactile textures, soft rounded shapes, and vibrant but cozy colors.

headings.usage: Use for all major section headers, hero text, and emotional statements. It brings a 'Storybook' feel.

body.usage: Use for all UI text, buttons, inputs, and long-form reading. It is rounded and friendly.

primary.name: Coral Love
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Heart icons, Important notifications

secondary.name: Sage Growth
secondary.usage: Success states, Family Tree connections, Secondary buttons

background.name: Warm Paper
background.usage: Main app background. NEVER pure white.

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the main background to give it a paper texture feel.
textures.doodles: Use hand-drawn SVG doodles (stars, hearts, squiggles) as background decorations.

photo_feed.rule: Images should have rounded-2xl corners. Mix portrait and landscape orientations.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Left) + Main Content (Center) + Activity Feed (Right - Optional)

cards.style: White background, rounded-3xl, soft shadow. Padding p-6 or p-8.

inputs.style: bg-[#F0F2F5] border-transparent focus:border-[#FF6B6B] focus:bg-white rounded-xl h-12 px-4
inputs.label: font-bold text-sm text-[#636E72] mb-2 block

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}

motion.micro_interactions: Heart icons should 'pop' when clicked. Messages should slide in from the bottom.

hero_family.alt: Happy diverse family having a picnic

family_tree.style: Nodes should look like leaves or fruits. Edges should be curved brown lines. Background should be a subtle parchment texture.
family_tree.interaction: Zoom and Pan enabled. Click node to see profile.

chat.style: Bubbles. User: Coral background, White text. Others: Gray background, Dark text.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on Coral background is White. Text on Cream background must be Dark Slate.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Sunday Morning Picnic' color palette and fonts.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to index.html immediately.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI logic but completely override the styles to match the 'Soft Clay' aesthetic. No sharp corners!
5. LAYOUT: Build the 'Bento Grid' for the photo gallery using CSS Grid.
6. FAMILY TREE: Implement a basic visualization using a library or custom SVG if libraries are too heavy.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No default blue/gray SaaS look.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Nunito' and 'Fraunces'.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
